item.title: Expressive SQL
item.description: MERGE INTO prod.nyc.taxis pt USING (SELECT * FROM staging.nyc.taxis) st ON pt.id = st.id WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT *; Done!

item.title: Time Travel and Rollback
item.description: SELECT count(*) FROM nyc.taxis 2,853,020 SELECT count(*) FROM nyc.taxis FOR VERSION AS OF 2188465307835585443 2,798,371 SELECT count(*) FROM nyc.taxis FOR TIMESTAMP AS OF TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000000 Z' 2,798,371
